25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin Ja'far: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would eat snake cucumber with fresh dates. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih Gharib, we do not know of it except as a narration of Ibrahim bin Sa'd

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَكْلِ الْقِثَّاءِ بِالرُّطَبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Eating Snake Cucumber With Fresh Dates
